topic.title: Now Available: Foreign Relations of the United States, 1977–1980, Volume XXIX, Panama
topic.body: The focus of this volume is on the Carter administration’s efforts to negotiate, sign, ratify, and implement new Panama Canal treaties.
topic.image-description: Book cover of Foreign Relations of the United States, 1977–1980, Volume XXIX, Panama
topic.image-source-information: Created by the Office of the Historian
